content: We, BSIT 1-4, are students in the Information Technology field which don't just focus on learning about technology, but also here to take care about nature. We're always prepared to assist, do public service, and are here to take care of our environment. We don't just work in a "Come what may" way, but we ensure that we have unity, and flawless synergy to accomplish our tasks in a meticulous way guaranteeing satisfaction, and quality work.
